title: By Chance or By Design?: The Story of Premier Designs & Founders, Andy and Joan Horner
description: Can a successful company be built on biblical principles? Andy Homer answers with a resounding yes This story of the growth of a unique direct sales company shows what a corporation can do when people are its number one asset. Relating the colorful events of his life, Andy Homer traces the providential hand of God that led him to start a new kind of company with the purpose of "Enriching Every Life We Touch".
author: Andrew J. Horner
